scripts.build:all:dev: npx dotenv -c development -- eas build --profile development --platform all
scripts.build:all:preview: npx dotenv -c preview -- eas build --profile preview --platform all
scripts.build:all:staging: npx dotenv -c staging -- eas build --profile staging --platform all
scripts.build:android:dev: npx dotenv -c development -- eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.build:android:preview: npx dotenv -c preview -- eas build --profile preview --platform android
scripts.build:android:staging: npx dotenv -c staging -- eas build --profile staging --platform android
scripts.build:ios:dev: npx dotenv -c development -- eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.build:ios:preview: npx dotenv -c preview -- eas build --profile preview --platform ios
scripts.build:ios:staging: npx dotenv -c staging -- eas build --profile staging --platform ios
scripts.start:android: npx dotenv -c development -- npx expo run:android
scripts.start:android:prod: npx dotenv -c production -- npx expo run:android --variant release
scripts.start:devclient: npx dotenv -c development -- npx expo start --tunnel --dev-client --scheme dev.com.REPLACE-ME
scripts.start:ios: npx dotenv -c development -- npx expo run:ios
scripts.start:ios:prod: npx dotenv -c production -- npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.start:prod: npx dotenv -c production -- npx expo start --no-dev --minify
scripts.start:tunnel: npx dotenv -c development -- npx expo start --tunnel
